description.raw:
This puts the `ign_find_package(ign-physics ...)` call into the root CMakeLists.txt so that configuration quits gracefully if `ign-physics` cannot be found. As it currently is, cmake will spew a lot of confusing noise if `ign-physics` is unavailable.

Right now it's set as `REQUIRED`, but it could easily be made optional by putting the physics system source code into its own component directory, if that’s something we ever want to do.
